snippet: FEUER--Glenda, nee Silbert, 79, beloved wife of the late Irving Feuer, loving mother of Mitchell (Maddy), Eden (Steve) and Hugh; adored grandma of Scott, Jared, Casey, Ava, Sam, Emma, Drew and Braden; cherished sister of Edward. Glenda touched us ...
lead_paragraph: FEUER--Glenda, nee Silbert, 79, beloved wife of the late Irving Feuer, loving mother of Mitchell (Maddy), Eden (Steve) and Hugh; adored grandma of Scott, Jared, Casey, Ava, Sam, Emma, Drew and Braden; cherished sister of Edward. Glenda touched us with her joy for life, sparkling demeanor, melodious voice and fierce strength of character. Glenda loved opera, traveling, and most of all her children and grandchildren. We will miss Glenda dearly. Services Sunday at 12 noon, Riverside Nassau North Chapels, 55 North Station Plaza, Great Neck, NY 11021. Interment to follow at Mount Hebron Cemetery, Flushing, NY. In lieu of flowers, donations may be made to Lustgarten Foundation: Pancreatic Cancer Research or Tippett Hospice Home, Needham, MA.
